comments.creator: bugzilla-mozilla-20000923@james-ross.co.uk
comments.text:
We ought to support Private Browsing. At least following changes would need to be in effect:

- No normal logging.
- No input history persistence.
- No CEIP events logged.
- No history entries for URLs visited (might well be handled for us).
- No Join Channel channel caching (that'll be fun, we can't support the dialog without it currently).
- No preferences being saved? Not sure about this one.

None of these should be overridable, either; normal logging should indicate it is "disabled for Private Browsing" instead of "on" and stay that way.
